knimeNode.name: Polynomial Regression Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predictor that uses learned polynomial regression coefficients

fullDescription.intro: This node predicts numerical values using the regression coefficients learned by a polynomial regression learner. The unclassified data must have the same columns as used for the polynomial regression learner. Additional columns are ignored, rows containing missing values are also ignored.

ports.dataIn: The data table with the yet unclassified patterns.
ports.dataOut: The input table with predicted values.
